name: Intro
_source: speak;Sal;We're approaching the border, with nary a sound...|Until now...
speak;Blazing;Uhm, I know borders are well protected, but...|It was not like this when I departed...
speak;Sal;I suppose I should tell you, we're kind of in er... Trouble at the moment...
speak;Sal;Prince Elias was murdered by a rogue assassin...
speak;Blazing;You're not going to k-kill me, are you?!
speak;Sal;Hey! We were framed!|I will help you get home, alright?
speak;Blazing;Framed... Well, I suppose that makes sense...|If you wanted to kill me, you'd have already done it...
speak;Blazing;*Gulp*|If this is true, the Goddess must see the truth revealed.|Consider my magic to be yours.|I might be inexperienced, but my strength lies in my faith.
speak;Barnabus;Looks like they've fallen into our lap!|At 'em! Show them the might of Monsdor!
speak;Sal;News sure does travel fast, huh?|Well, there's not much we can do but fight!|You can stand back if you wish.
speak;Blazing;As I said, I believe I will be fine.|My light magic will purge through our foes' armor.|Though I suppose keeping me out of blades' range would be useful...
